import torchvision
ixi_no_skull = "1zBQl0mL3RQ3f8OrREQupUDsqS-6pHKGZ" #1-3SmcOUvzs_9QCo0YyDcHVae6HFPacJ4
torchvision.datasets.utils.download_file_from_google_drive(ixi_no_skull, "./", filename="ixinoskull.zip", md5=None)
shutil.unpack_archive("ixinoskull.zip", "./dataset/normal_ixi_no_skull")
os.remove("ixinoskull.zip")
ixi = "1ORrUE_EO_BtdOzZIog6zBtt6pU2DXBmz" #1-2Cxtx-g7pt791dDDf5Gf-JONI6HO9aT
torchvision.datasets.utils.download_file_from_google_drive(ixi, "./", filename="ixi.zip", md5=None)
shutil.unpack_archive("ixi.zip", "./dataset/normal_ixi")
os.remove("ixi.zip")
